title: Permutations
text: A permutation refers to arranging objects in a specific order. When you permute $$n$$ objects, you are arranging all of them in a particular order.

title: Permutation of $$r$$ objects from $$n$$
text: When we choose $$r$$ objects from $$n$$ objects, the order matters. However, only $$r$$ objects are selected, not all $$n$$.

title: Order
text: In the permutation of choosing $$r$$ objects from $$n$$, you only arrange $$r$$ objects, while in the permutation of $$n$$ objects, you arrange all $$n$$ objects. The order matters in both cases.
